languages.text: "Благословенный Амарнат призывает тех, кто был верен ему, покончить с неверовавшими и тем завершить раскол".
"Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
languages.original_text: "Благословенный Амарнат призывает тех, кто был верен ему, покончить с неверовавшими и тем завершить раскол".

traits.locale_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
"Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
"Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
"Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
"Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

languages.text: “蒙福者阿玛纳特召唤那些忠于他的信徒，消灭那些怀疑之人，彻底结束分裂。”
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

traits.locale_text: “蒙福者阿玛纳特召唤那些忠于他的信徒，消灭那些怀疑之人，彻底结束分裂。”

languages.text: « Le bienheureux Amarnat demande à ceux qui lui sont restés fidèles de mettre fin aux mécréants et de combler le schisme. »
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

traits.locale_text: « Le bienheureux Amarnat demande à ceux qui lui sont restés fidèles de mettre fin aux mécréants et de combler le schisme. »

languages.text: «El bendito Amarnat invoca a aquellos que le han seguido siendo leales para eliminar a los no creyentes y así acabar con el cisma».
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

traits.locale_text: «El bendito Amarnat invoca a aquellos que le han seguido siendo leales para eliminar a los no creyentes y así acabar con el cisma».

languages.text: 「祝福されしアマルナトは、不信心者たちに引導を渡し、分裂を修復するよう、彼に忠誠を誓った人々に呼びかけている」
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福されしアマルナトは、不信心者たちに引導を渡し、分裂を修復するよう、彼に忠誠を誓った人々に呼びかけている」

languages.text: "Der gesegnete Amarnat ruft alle ihm loyal Gebliebenen auf, den Ungläubigen ein Ende zu bereiten und so die Spaltung zu beenden."
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."

traits.locale_text: "Der gesegnete Amarnat ruft alle ihm loyal Gebliebenen auf, den Ungläubigen ein Ende zu bereiten und so die Spaltung zu beenden."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat, ona sadık kalanlardan inançsızları yok edip bölünmeye son vermelerini istiyor."
languages.original_text: "Blessed Amarnat calls upon those who remained loyal to him to put an end to the unbelievers and thus mend the schism."
